attributes.action: Stop all aid to all African states that refuse to stand against the Mugabe regime.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is unbelievable that only Kenya has publicly spoke against Mugabe, after seeing on the BBC news the contempt of the Mugabe Bodyguards within the AU community it is blatant that Africa needs help in ridding itself of these type of neanderthals. By stating that Britain will stop aid to unco-operating states, their people will hopefully put pressure on their governments. Not fair, but in the long run better for all.

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
